className.description: The item class name for which data will be exported in batch.

endTime.description: The end time of export task operation.

errorMessage.description: The error message in case of export task's failed execution.

externalReferenceCode.description: The optional external key of this account.

processedItemsCount.description: Number of items processed by export task opeartion.

startTime.description: The start time of export task operation.

totalItemsCount.description: Total number of items that will be processed by export task operation.

executeStatus.description: The status of export task's execution.

item.description: The item which failed to be imported.

itemIndex.description: Position of the item in the import file. For CSV file it will represent a line number, for JSON file it will represent an array index etc.

message.description: Message describing the reason of import failure.

className.description: The item class name for which data will be processed in batch.

endTime.description: The end time of import task operation.

errorMessage.description: The error message in case of import task's failed execution.

externalReferenceCode.description: The optional external key of this account.

processedItemsCount.description: Number of items processed by import task opeartion.

startTime.description: The start time of import task operation.

totalItemsCount.description: Total number of items that will be processed by import task operation.

executeStatus.description: The status of import task's execution.

importStrategy.description: Defines if import task will fail when error occurs or continue importing rest of the items.
